description:
In this episode, a dog rewards a kind master, and an old woman`s gift is repaid, and a man buys a dream.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanasaka Jiisan / Yume o Katta Otoko / Nezumikyou
The Old Man Who Made the Dead Trees Blossom / The Man Who Bought Dreams / The Rat Sutra
花さか爺さん / 夢を買った男 / ねずみ経
